description.narrative: IISS has submitted a request for core support towards the implementation of its strategy (2021 - 2025) for the next four years. The strategy was developed based on the lessons learned from the previous strategy period (2017 - 2020) and is also informed by the changing peace and security dynamics in the continent. The process of adaptation to the existing COVID-19 context has also been reflected upon in the strategy document. For the strategy period 2021 - 2025, ISS has an overall goal to have evidence-based human security policies and practices is developed and implemented in Africa. The strategy has five outcome areas: - Decision makers on African human security and development challenges are informed by ISS research and analysis - Participants in ISS-convened dialogues & gatherings influence policy debates about human security challenges in Africa - Policies, strategies, programmes in key institutions dealing with Africa’s human security challenges are improved - Stakeholders’ capacity is built to effectively intervene with the aim of improving human security in Africa. - The ISS is an efficient and equitable employer, which develops its staff and encourages collaboration across offices and programmes. The strategy document also presents fourteen thematic topics including: African futures; Gender equality; Africa in the world; Governance, Peace and security; Democratic governance beyond elections; Capacity to prevent, manage and resolve conflicts and sustain peace; Youth peace and security; Maritime security; Migration and forced displacement; Security and governance of new technology; National and trans-national crime and violence; Violent extremism and counter- terrorism; Violence prevention; Criminal justice; and Climate change and human security.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

tag.narrative: 16.1 - Avsevärt minska alla former av våld och dödligt våld överallt.
16.1 - Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.
16.3 - Främja rättssäkerheten på nationell och internationell nivå samt säkerställa lika tillgång till rättvisa för alla.
16.3 - Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all.
16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
